entities.name: Professor Umbridge
entities.description: The professor is introduced as the one who is giving a lecture to the class. The text states, "Good afternoon, Professor Umbrid ge," they chanted drearily.

entities.name: Slytherins
entities.description: The text mentions Slytherins as a group of students who have been given permission by Professor Umbridge. The text states, "She just said she needed a bit of time to consider."
